response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I propose a price of $9,500 for it. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity cost for me in terms of selling it to other potential buyers. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 9500}
